column2: "...It's starting to feel like we're turning into a comedy double-act."
"As long as we're bright-eyed and bushy-tailed, that's fine by me! Can't you just see my Photons sparkling?"
"Speaking of which, Photons are unusual, aren't they? You can't see them, but they're everywhere, and we can draw on them for power."
"Not only that, but they respond to our emotions, like when we're trying really hard or when we're feeling down!"
"It's so wonderful that we're always together!"
"Patty's expression is needlessly poetic, but it's worthwhile to know about Photons."
"Each person tends to have their strong and weak points when controlling Photons."
"I do best as a Force, and Patty is more suited to be a Hunter."
"However, our newer recruits are different. They have the ability to choose their Photon affinity."
"Like you, for example. I wish we had your ability to change class whenever you want."
"Hm? Don't you like being a Force?"
"I don't like you being a Hunter."
"You're always running off ahead and causing me trouble. I wish you'd try to see things from my point of view once in a while."
"...Didn't I just tell you how annoying that is?"
